word:
There is a great work to be done. Some will ask, 
                                                                           14
What can be done to work the city of Nashville effectively? One way to success is to get a place a few miles out of Nashville, and there establish a school and a sanitarium, and from these institutions as a working center, begin to work Nashville as we have not worked it yet. [PORTION OF A TALK AT COLLEGE VIEW, NEB., SEPT. 25, 1904.] 

                                               -
